Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Dark Prime::

    "Ironhide," Dark Prime said. "We will get the chance to=
 destroy our enemies, but, as you can see, we don't have the weaponry. Even=
 with my connection to the Oracle and what power over Time I have it would =
still be hard."
    Just then Dark Prime received a warning from the Oracle=
 computer. (Remember it is just that, a computer) He accessed the Oracle wi=
thin his mind and through it he tried to access Vector Sigma. He couldn't. =
He tried some back roots, and found the problem.
    "It seems that someone=
 has spotted us," He said to Ironhide. "Well no matter, let them come, the =
Traps are set, and we should have the weaponry to defeat these foes. Until =
then I will try and gain access to Vector Sigma itself."
    He went into t=
he Oracle again, and the Oracle seeing an "evil" Spark wouldn't let him acc=
ess Vector Sigma. He used some power to mask his Spark Signal (Nobody sees =
it, it seems like he's gone off-line...) Then tries again. This time it wor=
ks. He access the Vector Sigma computer and Downloads the program for the K=
ey and others.
    Then he returns back to Nod. A Key to Vector Sigma appea=
rs in his hand, and he looks at it. He shoots a tree with it and the tree t=
urns techno.
    Dark Prime sneers....
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, October =
11, 2000 6:00 PM
  Subject: Re: Valtron


  ::Grimmler::

  "Aha!" Grimmler=
 exclaims as the Cybertronian Fire's computer locates Prime's 
  signature,=
 zooming in on it, and another signiture next to it.

  Grimmler turns to M=
angus. "There it is, you want to go and take him out or 
  what?"

        =
eGroups Sponsor
